definitions.definition: According to good order or practice ; appropriately , in a well-behaved or orderly ( adjective ) way.
In order; in a particular order or succession; with a suitable arrangement.

main_definition: ( now rare ) According to good order or practice ; appropriately , in a well-behaved or orderly ( adjective ) way. [from 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) In order; in a particular order or succession; with a suitable arrangement. [15th–19th c.]
